rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! Adel-sama!
I heard that the capital's been attacked!

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh... It's true?
What to do...

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0003
rows.name:
At least Aletta hasn't fallen into
large-scale disorder yet. It's still
fairly safe here.

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Everyone at the mansion, your wife,
we all worry about you when you're
away in dangerous places, Adel-sama.

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0005
rows.name:
They're deeply concerned but they
won't, and can't, tell you to come
home. They understand that.

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0006
rows.name:
When it comes to it, we'll open up the
mansion to needy people, in line with
your orders.

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I'll make sure that we're mentally and
logistically prepared for that,
Adel-sama.

rows.label: tlk70000052_03_msg0008
rows.name:
Please, Adel-sama... Don't overextend
yourself trying to resolve this situation
too quickly.
